body_html:
Thank you @manuelsh for pointing this issue out.
I have one question, did you use the tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell with layer_norm=True for your experiments? or have you tried your custom layer normalization implementation? if yes, can you share it with us?
I have tried the @MycChiu pull request and I got fast layer_normalization in term of time but it required more steps to converge than the model without layer_normalization !!!

Thank you @manuelsh for pointing this issue out. 
I have one question, did you use the `tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell` with `layer_norm=True` for your experiments? or have you tried your custom layer normalization implementation? if yes, can you share it with us?
I have tried the @MycChiu  pull request and I got fast layer_normalization in term of time but it required more steps to converge than the model without layer_normalization !!!
